issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
A feature request has come in for the ability to style text on annotations. This would need to be a completely new annotation type which displays an object styled as a label. Will probably have to accept {{Ti.UI.Label}} objects for {{title}} and {{subtitle}} properties to ensure that they're styled correctly, and that we support every styling feature that a label does.

Android will need a parity ticket if this feature is implemented.
fields.summary: iOS: Add label styling to map annotations
